title: Meet Puppet Regime’s puppet master
tags: Geopolitics;Satire;Puppet regime;_stuck in high school together_;_accidentally inviting_;___GZERO World___;_Instagram_;_YouTube_;_occurred_;_unfolding_;And as far as creative influences, I’d point to the classic American edutainment cartoon “Schoolhouse Rock,” the legendary British puppet satire show “Spitting Image,” and “Kukly,” a Russian puppet satire show so scathing that **Vladimir Putin** cancelled it during his second year in office – something we alluded to in [_a recent episode_;_This Authoritarian Life_
